title: Why!!!!!?????
body: So, the pre-season.... it's alright.... but... Nasus has gotten completely screwed over.... he just seems unplayable now.... i've tried everything i can and it's just not the same, and i hate it, i finally found a champion that i can finally enjoy playing and boom, i cant play him anymore, and i'm so sad now...

replies.body:
~~The fucking pre-season has been out for a day. Stfu.~~

Try getting better at the game. :)
I mean, theres a video, literally telling you what to do as nasus, look at your client, FAST NASUS, that makes him reasonably playable

Take grasp. It's significantly better than anything else and it was what Nasus took when keystones first came out.

Flat CDR runes were more of a luxury in farm lanes than actually useful general purpose runes.

What rune page are you running? Try out Glacial Augment with Biscuit Delivery, Cosmic Insight and Slightly Magical Boots, for secondary runes... idk, go Resolve for the bonus early game health and take Demolish and Overgrowth. it sounds cancerous on paper but it might not be as practical in-game.
